## Biography
Doctor in Sciences in the area of Public Health at the National School of Public Health. Associate Professor II of the Universidade Federal Fluminense, permanent professor in the Postgraduate Program in Health Collective of the Universidade Federal de Mato Grosso and the PPG Health Collective of UFF. Visiting professor at the University of Padova, Italy (2019) and University of Nottingham, England (2019). We have experience in the area of Collective Health, with emphasis on Worker's Health, focusing mainly on the following topics: critical theories and health relations, work and environment, contemporary work, surveillance in work-related health, production chains and work-related mental health. . He was coordinator of the PPGSC/ISC/UFMT (2016-2018), member of the Comissão de Avaliação de Programs de Pós-Graduação em Saúde Coletiva da CAPES - Qudriênio (2017-2020) and was associate editor in the Health of Work area of the newspaper Ciência Health Collective (2015-2018), member of the EdUFMT Editorial Council (2020-2022) and associate editor of the Brazilian Journal of Occupational Health. He was a member of the Núcleo Gestor de Ciências Sociais e Humanas em Saúde (2020-2023) of the Brazilian Association of Health Collective (Abrasco).

:::
